and [93mpercentages[0m, with [93mtreatments[0m over [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m% of the [93mtotal[0m [93mclassified[0m as [93mcommon[0m. [93mStatistical[0m [93manalyses[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mStudent[0m'[93ms[0m [93mt[0m-[93mtest[0m and [93mchi[0m-[93msquared[0m [93mtest[0m for [93msubgroup[0m [93mdifferences[0m ([93mp[0m < [93m0[0m.[93m05[0m [93msignificant[0m). [93mCommonly[0m [93mused[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m were [93mcross[0m-[93mreferenced[0m with the [93mMOH[0m [93mdrug[0m [93mdatabase[0m for [93mregistration[0m and [93mreimbursement[0m [93mstatus[0m. [93mResults[0m: A [93mtotal[0m of [93m3[0m,[93m284[0m [93mcompassionate[0m [93mtreatments[0m were [93madministered[0m, [93memploying[0m [93m596[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m to [93maddress[0m [93m1[0m,[93m361[0m [93mconditions[0m in [93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m. [93mTemporal[0m [93manalysis[0m [93midentified[0m a [93mpeak[0m in [93m2020[0m, which [93maccounted[0m for [93m24[0m% of [93mtotal[0m [93mtreatments[0m, [93mfollowed[0m by a [93mdecrease[0m [93mthereafter[0m. [93mPatient[0m [93mage[0m [93mstratification[0m [93mindicated[0m that those [93maged[0m [93m65[0m to [93m80[0m [93mreceived[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mtreatment[0m [93mproportion[0m ([93m26[0m%), while the [93m45[0m to [93m65[0m [93mage[0m [93mgroup[0m [93maccounted[0m for [93m19[0m%. [93mTreatments[0m were [93mmainly[0m [93mBelantamab[0m [93mmafodotin[0m and [93mTrametinib[0m were the [93mmost[0m [93mfrequently[0m [93mutilized[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m, [93maccounting[0m for [93m9[0m% and [93m8[0m.[93m6[0m% of [93mtreatments[0m, [93mrespectively[0m. [93mDisease[0m [93mcategory[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mrevealed[0m that [93mrelapsed[0m [93mrefractory[0m [93mconditions[0m [93mtreated[0m, [93mvarying[0m by [93mage[0m [93mgroup[0m. [93mNotably[0m, [93m60[0m% of the [93mmost[0m [93mcommon[0m [93mtechnologies[0m ([93m13[0m out of [93m22[0m) were [93msubsequently[0m [93mincluded[0m into the [93mnational[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mbasket[0m, [93mtypically[0m [93mfollowing[0m an [93mextended[0m [93mperiod[0m of [93mcompassionate[0m [93muse[0m that [93mexceeded[0m [93mtwo[0m [93myears[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: The [93mstudy[0m [93msuggests[0m that [93mIsrael[0m'[93ms[0m [93mcompassionate[0m [93muse[0m [93mprograms[0m [93mhave[0m [93maccelerated[0m [93mearly[0m [93maccess[0m to [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapies[0m for [93mcomplex[0m [93mconditions[0m and [93mprovided[0m a [93mbridge[0m to the [93minclusion[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m in the [93mnational[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mbasket[0m. [93mNonetheless[0m, the [93mstudy[0m - The [93mPeriodic[0m [93mTable[0m Of [93mMetals[0m And [93mNonmetals[0m
- [93mTrend[0m of [93mmalaria[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m among [93mpregnant[0m [93mwomen[0m, [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m, [93mGhana[0m, [93m2018[0m-[93m2022[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mMalaria[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m ([93mMiP[0m) [93mremains[0m a [93mserious[0m [93mpublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mproblem[0m [93mdue[0m to its [93madverse[0m [93meffects[0m on [93mmaternal[0m [93mhealth[0m, [93mpregnancy[0m [93moutcomes[0m, and the [93mcost[0m of [93mhealthcare[0m [93mdelivery[0m. [93mSignificant[0m [93msuccesses[0m [93mhave[0m been [93machieved[0m in [93mcontrolling[0m [93mmalaria[0m [93mglobally[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mlittle[0m is [93mknown[0m about the [93mprogress[0m [93mmade[0m in [93mcontrolling[0m [93mmalaria[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdescribed[0m the [93mtrend[0m of the [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m of [93mGhana[0m from [93m2018[0m to [93m2022[0m. [93mMethods[0m: The [93mstudy[0m [93memployed[0m a [93mretrospective[0m, [93mdescriptive[0m, [93mcross[0m-[93msectional[0m [93mstudy[0m [93musing[0m [93mdata[0m from [93m2018[0m to [93m2022[0m. [93mData[0m on [93mmalaria[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m was [93mextracted[0m from the [93mDHIMS[0m [93m2[0m [93mdatabase[0m and [93mtransferred[0m into [93mMicrosoft[0m [93mExcel[0m [93mversion[0m [93m19[0m. [93mDescriptive[0m [93mstatistical[0m [93manalyses[0m were [93mdone[0m. [93mResults[0m were [93msummarised[0m into [93mfrequencies[0m and [93mpercentages[0m and [93mpresented[0m in [93mtables[0m, [93mgraphs[0m, and [93mmaps[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mOverall[0m, the [93mMiP[0m [93mtesting[0m [93mrate[0m was [93m90[0m.[93m8[0m% ([93m46[0m,[93m734[0m/[93m51[0m,[93m479[0m) and [93m54[0m.[93m5[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m54[0m.[93m0[0m-[93m55[0m.[93m0[0m) of [93mpregnant[0m [93mwomen[0m [93mtested[0m [93mpositive[0m. The [93mmajority[0m, [93m68[0m.[93m0[0m%, of [93mMiP[0m [93mcases[0m in the [93mregion[0m were [93mmothers[0m [93maged[0m [93m20[0m-[93m34[0m [93myears[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m was [93mhighest[0m among [93mmothers[0m [93maged[0m below [93m20[0m [93myears[0m, [93m59[0m.[93m3[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m58[0m.[93m1[0m-[93m60[0m.[93m6[0m). [93mBole[0m [93mDistrict[0m [93mhad[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m, [93m70[0m.[93m1[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m69[0m.[93m3[0m-[93m70[0m.[93m8[0m) and [93maccounted[0m for [93m40[0m.[93m5[0m% ([93m10[0m,[93m315[0m/[93m25[0m,[93m463[0m) of [93mall[0m [93mMiP[0m [93mcases[0m. [93mThere[0m was a [93mdecline[0m in the [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m from [93m2018[0m to [93m2022[0m from [93m60[0m.[93m4[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m59[0m.[93m3[0m-[93m61[0m.[93m5[0m) to [93m51[0m.[93m6[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m50[0m.[93m7[0m-[93m52[0m.[93m6[0m). [93mConclusion[0m: The [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m is [93mhigh[0m, with [93mdisparities[0m among [93mDistricts[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mthere[0m is an [93mapparent[0m [93mdecline[0m over the [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m. [93mThere[0m is a [93mneed[0m to [93mstrengthen[0m [93mexisting[0m [93mmalaria[0m [93mprevention[0m [93minterventions[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m, [93msuch[0m as the [93muse[0m of [93mSP[0m for [93mIPTp[0m and [93mITNs[0m to [93mprevent[0m [93mnegative[0m [93mmaternal[0m and [93mfetal[0m [93mbirth[0m [93moutcomes[0m. [93mPublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93meducation[0m [93mprogrammes[0m [93mcould[0m [93mimprove[0m the [93muptake[0m and [93mutilisation[0m of [93mITNs[0m. [93mFurther[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mshould[0m be [93mconducted[0m to [93munravel[0m the [93mreasons[0m for the [93mdisproportionately[0m [93mhigh[0m [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m in the [93mBole[0m [93mDistrict[0m to [93menable[0m the [93mimplementation[0m of - [93mImplementation[0m of [93mrobot[0m-[93massisted[0m [93mspine[0m [93msurgery[0m in an [93macademic[0m [93mcenter[0m: [93mworkflow[0m, [93mlearning[0m [93mcurve[0m and [93mperspectives[0m.: [93mSurgical[0m [93mrobotics[0m [93mrepresent[0m a [93msignificant[0m [93madvancement[0m in [93mhealthcare[0m, [93menhancing[0m [93mprecision[0m and [93msafety[0m in [93moperative[0m [93mprocedures[0m. While [93mwidely[0m [93mused[0m in [93mneurosurgery[0m, [93mvisceral[0m [93msurgery[0m, and [93murology[0m, its [93madoption[0m in [93mspinal[0m [93msurgery[0m [93mremains[0m in [93mdevelopment[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mreports[0m the [93mimplementation[0m of [93mrobotic[0m-[93massisted[0m [93mspine[0m [93msurgery[0m within a [93mneurosurgical[0m [93mdepartment[0m, [93mfocusing[0m on the [93mlearning[0m [93mcurve[0m, [93mworkflow[0m [93mintegration[0m, [93mcomplications[0m, and [93mprospects[0m. [93mSuccessful[0m [93mintegration[0m [93mrequires[0m a [93mdedicated[0m [93mtechnical[0m [93minfrastructure[0m and [93mthorough[0m [93mtraining[0m-[93mboth[0m [93mtheoretical[0m and [93mpractical[0m-for the [93mentire[0m [93msurgical[0m [93mteam[0m. [93mCollaboration[0m among [93msurgeons[0m, [93mparamedical[0m [93mstaff[0m, and [93mbiomedical[0m [93mengineers[0m is [93messential[0m to [93moptimize[0m [93moutcomes[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mused[0m a [93mtable[0m-[93mmounted[0m [93mrobotic[0m [92msystem[0m ([93mMazor[0m [93mX[0m [93mStealth[0m [93mEdition[0m, [93mMedtronic[0m), with [93msurgical[0m [93mplanning[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mpreoperative[0m, [93msub[0m-[93mmillimetric[0m [93mbone[0m-[93mdensity[0m [93mCT[0m [93mscans[0m to [93mensure[0m [93mpersonalized[0m [93mcare[0m. From [93mNovember[0m [93m2022[0m to [93mMay[0m [93m2023[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mincluded[0m [93m32[0m [93mpatients[0m with an [93maverage[0m [93mage[0m of [93m58[0m [93my[0m/[93mo[0m ([93mSD[0m [93m15[0m ([93m19[0m; [93m87[0m)) for a [93mtotal[0m of [93m204[0m [93minserted[0m [93mscrews[0m. [93mDegenerative[0m [93mspine[0m [93mrepresented[0m the [93mmain[0m [93mindication[0m [93mfollowed[0m by [93mtumoral[0m [93mspine[0m. [93mOptimal[0m [93maccuracy[0m for [93mpedicle[0m [93mscrew[0m [93mplacement[0m was [93m97[0m % [93mcorresponding[0m to [93mgrade[0m A ([93m90[0m.[93m1[0m%) and [93mgrade[0m [93mB[0m ([93m6[0m.[93m9[0m%) from [93mGRS[0m. The [93moperating[0m [93mtime[0m was of [93m186[0m.[93m7[0m [93mmin[0m ([93mSD[0m [93m89[0m.[93m7[0m ([93m45[0m; [93m386[0m)) and the [93maverage[0m [93mfluoroscopy[0m [93mtime[0m [93mper[0m [93mscrew[0m was of [93m3[0m.[93m0[0m [93ms[0m ([93m1[0m.[93m8[0m-[93m5[0m.[93m5[0m). [93mInstallation[0m is a [93mtime[0m-[93mconsuming[0m [93mstep[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mobserved[0m a [93mtrend[0m [93mtowards[0m [93mshorter[0m [93moperating[0m [93mtimes[0m as [93mmore[0m [93mcases[0m are [93moperated[0m on. Only [93m2[0m [93msuperficial[0m [93mskin[0m [93minfections[0m were [93mreported[0m, with no [93mother[0m [93mcomplication[0m. [93mRobotic[0m [93mspine[0m [93msurgery[0m [93mimproves[0m [93mstandardization[0m, [93menhances[0m [93maccuracy[0m, and [93mpromotes[0m [93mpersonalized[0m [93mmedicine[0m, with [93mpotential[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93mworkflow[0m [93moptimization[0m.
- [93mEpidemiology[0m of [93manti[0m-[93mneutrophil[0m [93mcytoplasmic[0m [93mantibody[0m-[93massociated[0m [93mvasculitis[0m in [93mLithuania[0m, [93m2012[0m-[93m2021[0m: a [93mretrospective[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mstudy[0m.: [93mObjectives[0m: The [93maim[0m of this [93mstudy[0m was to [93massess[0m the [93mincidence[0m, [93mprevalence[0m and [93mmortality[0m of [93manti[0m-[93mneutrophil[0m [93mcytoplasmic[0m [93mantibody[0m ([93mANCA[0m)-[93massociated[0m [93mvasculitis[0m ([93mAAV[0m) in [93mLithuania[0m. [92mDesign[0m: [93mRetrospective[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mstudy[0m. [93mSetting[0m: [93mLithuanian[0m [93mNational[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mInsurance[0m [93mFund[0m and [93mCauses[0m of [93mDeath[0m [93mregistries[0m, [93mcovering[0m [93m1[0m [93mJanuary[0m [93m2012[0m through [93m31[0m [93mDecember[0m [93m2021[0m. [93mParticipants[0m: [93mPatients[0m were [93midentified[0m from [93mnational[0m [93mhealthcare[0m [93mregistries[0m in [93mLithuania[0m. The [93mfollowing[0m [93minclusion[0m [93mcriteria[0m were [93mapplied[0m: [93m1[0m) [95mdiagnosis[0m of [93meosinophilic[0m [93mgranulomatosis[0m with [93mpolyangiitis[0m ([93mEGPA[0m), [93mgranulomatosis[0m with [93mpolyangiitis[0m ([93mGPA[0m) or [93mmicroscopic[0m [93mpolyangiitis[0m ([93mMPA[0m) ([95mdiagnosis[0m [93mcodes[0m [93mM30[0m.[93m1[0m, [93mM31[0m.[93m3[0m and [93mM31[0m.[93m7[0m, [93maccording[0m to [93mInternational[0m [93mClassification[0m of [93mDiseases[0m [93m10[0m [93mth[0m [93mversion[0m ([93mICD[0m-[93m10[0m)) [93mrecorded[0m between [93m1[0m [93mJanuary[0m [93m2012[0m and [93m31[0m [93mDecember[0m [93m2021[0m; [93m2[0m) [95mdiagnosis[0m of [93mAAV[0m was [93mrecorded[0m in the [93mdatabase[0m at [93mleast[0m [93mtwice[0m with at [93mleast[0m [93m1[0m-[93mmonth[0m [93mperiod[0m between the [93mtwo[0m [93mtimepoints[0m; [93m3[0m) a [93mrecord[0m of at [93mleast[0m [93monce[0m [93mprescribed[0m [93mreimbursed[0m [93mmedication[0m-[93mglucocorticoids[0m ([93mprednisolone[0m or [93mmethylprednisolone[0m), [93mconventional[0m [93msynthetic[0m [93mdisease[0m-[93mmodifying[0m [93manti[0m-[93mrheumatic[0m [93mdrugs[0m ([93mmethotrexate[0m, [93mazathioprine[0m, [93mhydroxychloroquine[0m and [93mcyclophosphamide[0m) or [93mbiological[0m [93mdisease[0m-[93mmodifying[0m [93manti[0m-[93mrheumatic[0m [93mdrug[0m ([93mrituximab[0m or [93mavailable[0m [93mbiosimilars[0m); and [93m4[0m) [93mage[0m >[93m18[0m [93myears[0m at the [93mtime[0m of [95mdiagnosis[0m. [93mOutcome[0m [93mmeasures[0m: [93mData[0m for the [93manalysis[0m [93mincluded[0m [93msex[0m, [93mage[0m, [93mICD[0m-[93m10[0m [93mcode[0m of [93mAAV[0m, the [93mfirst[0m [93mdate[0m of [93mAAV[0m [95mdiagnosis[0m and [93mdate[0m of [93mdeath[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m was [93msubdivided[0m into [93mperiods[0m [93m1[0m ([93m2013[0m-[93m2015[0m), [93m2[0m ([93m2016[0m-[93m2018[0m) and [93m3[0m ([93m2019[0m-[93m2021[0m). [93mTemporal[0m [93mtrends[0m of the [93mincidence[0m of [93mAAV[0m were [93massessed[0m. [93mPoint[0m [93mprevalence[0m [93mdata[0m were [93mrecorded[0m. [93mSex[0m- and [93mage[0m-[93mstandardised[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mratios[0m ([93mSMRs[0m) were [93mcalculated[0m. The [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m of [93mpatients[0m with [93mAAV[0m was [93mestimated[0m by [93mstandard[0m [93msingle[0m-[93mdecrement[0m [93mlife[0m-[93mtable[0m [93manalysis[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mWe[0m [93midentified[0m [93m236[0m [93mpatients[0m with [93mAAV[0m ([93mfemale[0m, [93m58[0m%) with an [93mannual[0m [93mincidence[0m of [93m8[0m.[93m22[0m [93mper[0m [93m1[0m [93m000[0m [93m000[0m [93madult[0m [93minhabitants[0m ([93mperiod[0m [93m1[0m, [93m9[0m.[93m83[0m; [93mperiod[0m [93m2[0m, [93m6[0m.[93m88[0m; [93mperiod[0m [93m3[0m, [93m7[0m.[93m95[0m). [93mIncreasing[0m [93mincidence[0m was [93mnoted[0m for [93mMPA[0m ([93mperiod[0m [93m1[0m, [93m0[0m.[93m9[0m; [93mperiod[0m [93m3[0m, [93m2[0m.[93m49[0m). The [93mincidence[0m of [93mGPA[0m ([93m4[0m.[93m89[0m [93mper[0m [93m1[0m [93m000[0m [93m000[0m [93minhabitants[0m [93mper[0m [93myear[0m) was [93mthree[0m [93mtimes[0m [93mhigher[0m than the [93mtotal[0m [93mincidence[0m of [93mEGPA[0m and [93mMPA[0m. The [93mprevalence[0m of [93mAAV[0m [93mper[0m [93m1[0m [93m000[0m [93m000[0m [93madult[0m [93mpopulation[0m [93mincreased[0m from [93m35[0m.[93m92[0m in [93m2015[0m to [93m69[0m.[93m14[0m in [93m2021[0m. [93m40[0m [93mdeaths[0m were [93mrecorded[0m during the [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m, with a [93mmean[0m [93mage[0m at [93mdeath[0m of [93m65[0m.[93m2[0m (±[93m13[0m.[93m03[0m). [93mAAV[0m was [93massociated[0m with [93mreduced[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m [93mcompared[0m with the [93mgeneral[0m [93mpopulation[0m, [93mespecially[0m when [95mdiagnosed[0m at a [93myoung[0m [93mage[0m. The [93mSMRs[0m for the [93mtotal[0m [93mAAV[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mrevealed[0m a [93mdecreasing[0m [93mtrend[0m: [93m1[0m.[93m79[0m in [93mperiod[0m [93m1[0m and [93m1[0m.[93m67[0m in [93mperiod[0m [93m3[0m. [93mConclusions[0m: [93mAAV[0m is [93massociated[0m with [93mincreased[0m [93mmortality[0m. During the [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m, the [93mincidence[0m of [93mAAV[0m was [93mfound[0m to be [93mstable[0m, and the [93mprevalence[0m [93mhas[0m [93mincreased[0m.
- A [93mfive[0m-[93mdecade[0m [93mreview[0m of [93macademic[0m [93mresearch[0m on [93mhealthcare[0m [93msupply[0m [93mchain[0m: a [93mbibliometric[0m [93mapproach[0m [93musing[0m [93mco[0m-[93mword[0m [93manalysis[0m and [93mbibliographic[0m [93mcoupling[0m.: [93mPurpose[0m: This [93mpaper[0m [93manalysed[0m the [93mimpact[0m and [93mevolution[0m of [93mscientific[0m [93mresearch[0m on the [93mhealthcare[0m [93msupply[0m [93mchain[0m ([93mHCS[0m) from a [93mlongitudinal[0m [93mperspective[0m, [93mcovering[0m the [93mperiod[0m [93m1971[0m-[93m2024[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [93mused[0m [93mdata[0m from the [93mWeb[0m of [93mScience[0m and [93mScopus[0m [93mdatabases[0m to [93midentify[0m [93memerging[0m and [93mestablished[0m [93mareas[0m of [93mstudy[0m in the [93mfield[0m of [93mHCS[0m. [92mDesign[0m/[93mmethodology[0m/[93mapproach[0m: A [93mbibliometric[0m [93mstudy[0m was [93mconducted[0m [93musing[0m a [93mdataset[0m of [93m3[0m,[93m602[0m [93mpublications[0m. The [93manalysis[0m [93mfocused[0m on [93mkeyword[0m [93mco[0m-[93moccurrences[0m to [93mexamine[0m the [93mevolution[0m of [93mHCS[0m [93mresearch[0m. The [93mrepresentation[0m of [93mkeywords[0m is [93mpresented[0m in [93mtables[0m, [93mdiagrams[0m and [93mlongitudinal[0m [93mmaps[0m to [93mhighlight[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mtopics[0m in the [93mfield[0m. [93mFindings[0m: This [93mstudy[0m [93mprovides[0m [93minsights[0m into the [93mevolution[0m of [93mHCS[0m [93mresearch[0m in [93mterms[0m of [93memerging[0m and [93mestablished[0m [93mareas[0m of [93mstudy[0m. The [93manalysis[0m of [93m3[0m,[93m602[0m [93mpublications[0m [93mallowed[0m the [93midentification[0m of [93mkey[0m [93mthemes[0m and [93mtrends[0m in the [93mfield[0m and [93moffers[0m a [93mcomprehensive[0m [93mview[0m of the [93mstate[0m of the [93mart[0m. The [93mresults[0m are [93mpresented[0m through [93mtables[0m, [93mdiagrams[0m and [93mlongitudinal[0m [93mmaps[0m, [93mthus[0m [93mfacilitating[0m a [93mclearer[0m [93munderstanding[0m of the [93mresearch[0m [93mlandscape[0m. [93mPractical[0m [93mimplications[0m: The [93mfindings[0m [93mhave[0m [93mpractical[0m [93mimplications[0m for [93mresearchers[0m and [93mscholars[0m in the [93mHSC[0m [93mdomain[0m. The [93midentified[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mareas[0m and [93mtrends[0m [93mprovide[0m [93mvaluable[0m [93mguidance[0m for [93mfuture[0m [93mresearch[0m in the [93mfield[0m. [93mResearchers[0m [93mcan[0m [93muse[0m this [93minformation[0m to [93mnavigate[0m the [93mcurrent[0m [93mstate[0m of the [93mfield[0m and [93mmake[0m [93minformed[0m [93mdecisions[0m about the [93mdirection[0m of [93mtheir[0m [93mresearch[0m. [93mOriginality[0m/[93mvalue[0m: This [93mstudy[0m [93mcontributes[0m to the [93munderstanding[0m of the [93mevolution[0m of [93mscientific[0m [93mresearch[0m on [93mhealthcare[0m [93msupply[0m [93mchain[0m from [93m1971[0m to [93m2024[0m. By [93memploying[0m [93mbibliometric[0m [93manalysis[0m and [93mvisual[0m [93mrepresentations[0m, a [93munique[0m [93mperspective[0m on the [93mHCS[0m [93mlandscape[0m is [93mpresented[0m. The [93mresults[0m [93mprovide[0m [93mvaluable[0m [93minsights[0m for [93mresearchers[0m and [93mscholars[0m, [93moffering[0m a [93mfoundation[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93minvestigations[0m in the [93mfield[0m of [93mHSC[0m [93mresearch[0m.
- [93mUse[0m and [93mApplication[0m of [93mmHealth[0m [93mTechnologies[0m in [93mPerioperative[0m [93mSurgical[0m [93mCare[0m: [93mNarrative[0m [93mReview[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mSurgical[0m [93mprocedures[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mpotential[0m [93mcomplications[0m [93mplace[0m [93msubstantial[0m [93mstrain[0m on [93mpatients[0m, [93mclinicians[0m, and [93mhealth[0m [93mcare[0m [92msystems[0m. These [93mstrains[0m are [93mdriven[0m by the [93manticipated[0m [93mmorbidity[0m and [93mmortality[0m, so that [93mthere[0m is [93mresource[0m-[93mintensive[0m [93mpostoperative[0m [93minpatient[0m [33mmanagement[0m. [93mGiven[0m the [93mconcentration[0m of [93msurgical[0m [93mservices[0m within [93mhospital[0m [93msettings[0m, [93mcurrent[0m [93mstandard[0m [93mlevels[0m of [93mcare[0m [93mhave[0m [93mlimitations[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mcommunication[0m [93mgaps[0m, [93mtime[0m [93mlapses[0m before [93mevaluation[0m, and [93minvestment[0m of [93mresources[0m, which [93mlimit[0m [93maccessibility[0m and [93mgenerate[0m [93mdisparities[0m in [93mdelivery[0m of [93mcare[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mrecent[0m [93madvances[0m in [93mdigital[0m [93mhealth[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mtelemedicine[0m [92mplatforms[0m, [93mmobile[0m [93mhealth[0m ([93mmHealth[0m), and [93mwearable[0m [93mtechnologies[0m, [93mpresent[0m an [93mopportunity[0m to [93mdecentralize[0m and [93mextend[0m [93mperioperative[0m [93mcare[0m into [93mcommunity[0m [93msettings[0m. This [93mreview[0m [95mexplored[0m how [93mestablished[0m [93mmHealth[0m [93mtechnologies[0m are being [95mintegrated[0m into the [93mperioperative[0m [91mpathway[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mimpact[0m on [93msurgical[0m [93mcare[0m [93mdelivery[0m and [93moutcomes[0m. It [93malso[0m [93mhighlights[0m [93mpossible[0m [93memerging[0m [92mmodels[0m of [93mremote[0m [93mphysician[0m and [93mpatient[0m [93minteraction[0m where [93mbenefits[0m [93mseem[0m to be [93moutweighing[0m the [93mrisks[0m. [93mObjective[0m: The [93maim[0m of this [93mnarrative[0m [93mreview[0m was to [93mpresent[0m [93mcollected[0m [93mevidence[0m for the [93muse[0m of [93mestablished[0m [93mmHealth[0m [93mtechnologies[0m in the [93msurgical[0m [91mpathway[0m of [93mpatients[0m and [93mhighlight[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mreadiness[0m and [93mpotential[0m in [92mmodels[0m of [93mstandard[0m [93mcare[0m. [93mMethods[0m: A [93mcomprehensive[0m [93mliterature[0m [93msearch[0m was [93mconducted[0m [93macross[0m [93mMEDLINE[0m ([93mvia[0m [93mPubMed[0m), [93mWeb[0m of [93mScience[0m, and [93mScopus[0m [93mdatabases[0m between [93mOctober[0m [93m2022[0m and [93mMay[0m [93m2024[0m. [93mAdditional[0m [94msources[0m were [93midentified[0m through [93mreference[0m [93mlist[0m [93mscreening[0m of [93mrelevant[0m [93msystematic[0m [93mreviews[0m. [93mData[0m were [93mextracted[0m and [93manalyzed[0m [93mbased[0m on [93msurgical[0m [93mspecialty[0m, [93mtype[0m of [93mmHealth[0m [93mintervention[0m, [93mcost[0m-[93meffectiveness[0m, and [93methical[0m [93mconsiderations[0m. [93mFindings[0m were [93msummarized[0m in [93mtables[0m to [93millustrate[0m [93mkey[0m [93mtrends[0m and [93mvariations[0m [93macross[0m [93mstudies[0m. The [93mextracted[0m [93mdata[0m were [93mtabulated[0m and [93mdescribed[0m [93mqualitatively[0m to [93mhighlight[0m [93msimilarities[0m, [93mdifferences[0m, and [93mpossible[0m [93memerging[0m [93mtrends[0m [93macross[0m the [93mstudies[0m. [93mResults[0m: A [93mtotal[0m of [93m28[0m [93marticles[0m [93mpublished[0m between [93m2008[0m and [93m2022[0m were [93mincluded[0m for [93mqualitative[0m [93manalysis[0m, with [93mmost[0m ([93mn[0m=[93m21[0m, [93m75[0m%) [93moriginating[0m from the [93mUnited[0m [93mStates[0m, [93mGermany[0m, and the [93mUnited[0m [93mKingdom[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [92mdesigns[0m were [93mpredominantly[0m [93mrandomized[0m [93mcontrolled[0m [93mtrials[0m ([93mn[0m=[93m9[0m, [93m32[0m%) and [93mobservational[0m [93mstudies[0m ([93mn[0m=[93m8[0m, [93m29[0m%). [93mCollectively[0m, these [93mstudies[0m [93minvolved[0m [93m6344[0m [93mpatients[0m [93mundergoing[0m [93mmHealth[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mperioperative[0m [93minterventions[0m [93mprimarily[0m in [93mgeneral[0m [93msurgery[0m, [93morthopedics[0m, and [93moncology[0m. [93mInterventions[0m [93mfrequently[0m [93mused[0m [93msmartphones[0m ([93mn[0m=[93m10[0m, [93m36[0m%) and [93mwearable[0m [93mdevices[0m, [93moften[0m in [93mcombination[0m with [93mother[0m [93mtracking[0m and [93mmeasuring[0m [92msystems[0m. [93mApplications[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mwound[0m [93mmonitoring[0m, [93mpostoperative[0m [93mfollow[0m-up, and [93mpatient[0m [93meducation[0m. [93mData[0m [93mcollection[0m was [93mmultimodal[0m and [93mtypically[0m [93mconducted[0m [93mdaily[0m, [93myet[0m only [93m36[0m% ([93m10[0m/[93m28[0m) of the [93marticles[0m [93mreported[0m [93mdefined[0m [93mfollow[0m-up [93mperiods[0m. [93mCost[0m-[93meffectiveness[0m was [93mrarely[0m [93massessed[0m, with only [93m4[0m% ([93m1[0m/[93m28[0m) of the [93marticles[0m [93mreporting[0m [93mper[0m-[93mpatient[0m [93msavings[0m. [93mOverall[0m, [93m64[0m% ([93m18[0m/[93m28[0m) of the [93marticles[0m were [93mrated[0m as [93mlow[0m [93mquality[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mmethodological[0m [93mlimitations[0m. [93mConclusions[0m: [93mmHealth[0m- and [93mtelehealth[0m-[93mbased[0m [93minterventions[0m [93mshow[0m [93mpromise[0m in [93menhancing[0m [93maspects[0m of [93mperioperative[0m [93mcare[0m by [93menabling[0m [93mremote[0m [93mmonitoring[0m, [93mpatient[0m [93mengagement[0m, and [93mimproved[0m [93mcare[0m [93mcontinuity[0m. [93mFuture[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mshould[0m [93mfocus[0m on [93mscalable[0m [93mimplementation[0m, [93mtrue[0m [93mcost[0m-[93meffectiveness[0m [93manalysis[0m, [93mequitable[0m [93maccess[0m, and [93mintegration[0m into [93mclinical[0m [93mworkflows[0m to [93mensure[0m [93mbroad[0m [93mapplicability[0m in [93mcurrent[0m [92mmodels[0m of [93mcare[0m.
